SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.platformer.escape_beyond.manager

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
com.platformer.escape_beyond.manager.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
Manages and centralizes game-related data for the game.

This class implements the Singleton design pattern, ensuring that only one instance of DataManager exists throughout the application. It provides centralized access to game state, player data, platform nodes, and other entities in the game.

The class also provides utility methods to initialize, retrieve, and clear game data.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DataManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of DataManager.

      If no instance exists, a new one is created. Ensures that only one instance of DataManager exists throughout the application.

      Returns:
      The singleton instance of DataManager.

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the game state and other related components.

      This method sets up the initial game state and resets the range iterator.

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState()
      Retrieves the current game state.
      Returns:
      The GameState object representing the current game state.

    • clearGameState

      public void clearGameState()
      Clears all game-related data, resetting the game to its initial state.

      This method clears all nodes, resets the destination node and player controller, and prepares the game data for a new session.
